t:type.name: PairingInput
t:type.t:description: A form parameter required to complete pairing.

t:attribute.name: type
t:attribute.description: The type of input, currently only TEXT and HIDDEN are supported.

t:attribute.name: name
t:attribute.description: The name of this input, used as the key when submitting a Search request.

t:attribute.name: label
t:attribute.description: The label to display to the user when rendering the form.

t:attribute.name: value
t:attribute.description: If specified this is the default value for the form, or in the case of HIDDEN this value should be submitted as the value to the Search command.

t:attribute.name: minlen
t:attribute.description: Minimum length of the input value.

t:attribute.name: maxlen
t:attribute.description: Maximum length of the input value.

t:attribute.name: required
t:attribute.description: Whether the input value is required.
